extracted.value: Preliminary Injunction Granted and Class Certification Granted

evidence.text: Initial Case Management Conference held on 7/2/2025. The Court orders expedited discovery on the topics discussed to allow the Court to address provisional certification as to the additional agencies. The Court set the following case schedule: Deadline for Plaintiffs file an amended complaint with additional proposed class representatives is 7/18/2025...
Hearing on motion to extend the scope of preliminary injunction and provisionally certified class set for 8/26/2025 10:00 AM in San Francisco, Courtroom 15, 18th Floor before Judge Rita F. Lin.
Motion Hearing set for 8/26/2025 10:00 AM in San Francisco, Courtroom 15, 18th Floor before Judge Rita F. Lin.
